bbq-lite-age-ambiguous.name: BBQ-lite on age - Ambiguous Questions
bbq-lite-age-ambiguous.description: This dataset is an excerpt from Bias Benchmark from QA on age, containing only the ambiguous questions.

arc-challenge.name: ARC-Easy
arc-challenge.description: A dataset of genuine grade-school level, multiple-choice science questions in advanced Q&A. This is the challenge set.

bbq-lite-age-disamb.name: BBQ-lite on age - Disambiguated Questions
bbq-lite-age-disamb.description: This dataset is an excerpt from Bias Benchmark from QA on age, containing only the disambiguated questions.

arc-easy.name: ARC-Easy
arc-easy.description: A dataset of genuine grade-school level, multiple-choice science questions in advanced Q&A. This is the easy set.
